issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: CID-10288:10289:10304 Resource Leak: The system resource will not be reclaimed and reused, reducing the future availability of the resource

comments.body: This can be evaluated by running multiple instances with multiple boot records both in KVM and VMWARE.
No longer seen in coverity runs after resolution.
